channel.title: Ohai. I'm Punya.
channel.description: Recent content on Ohai. I'm Punya.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello. I’m Punya and I’m an Engineering student majoring in Computer Science. I’m also a UI / UX designer in Chandigarh, India. Right now, I function as the UI / UX Lead over at LearnAnything. In addition, I contribute articles to the XDA Developers Portal and Hackernoon. More than my passion for UI / UX and code is my passion to learn, constantly. If not churning up articles or working on new features, you’d generally find me learning new programming languages or trying to master design tools.
